content.query:
DROP TABLE TrafficViolation;
CREATE TABLE TrafficViolation (
    LogId varchar(50),
    ViolationPatternId varchar(255),
    StatusId varchar(255),
    DocumentNumber varchar(255),
    OperationTeam varchar(100),
    Dear varchar(100),
    VehicleOwner varchar(100), 
    DOB datetime,
    Address varchar(255),
    LocationViolation varchar(255),
    Description varchar(1000),
    Coordinate varchar(255),
    SettlementAgency varchar(100),
    DateTranfer date,
    DateSolving date,
    ExtraData varchar(4000),
    ID varchar(50),
    CreatedAt date,
    UpdatedAt date, 
    DeletedAt date
)
DROP TABLE TrafficLog;
CREATE TABLE TrafficLog (
    Time date, 
    PlateNo varchar(50),
    PlateColor varchar(255),
    VehicleType varchar(255),
    VehicleColor varchar(255),
    VehicleModel varchar(255),
    Speed int,
    Lane int,
    IsWrongLane bit,
    IsOverload bit, 
    WeightOverload int,
    IsOversize bit,
    VolumeOversize varchar(100),
    VehicleLength int,
    VehicleWidth int, 
    VehicleHeight int,
    EventTraffic varchar(255),
    Hash varchar(255),
    ExtraData NVARCHAR(4000),
    ID varchar(50),
    CreatedAt date,
    UpdatedAt date, 
    DeletedAt date,
    AfterImg varchar(500),
    BeforeImg varchar(500), 
    BigImg varchar(500),
    SmallImg varchar(500)
)
